channel.title: [508]how do i make people mod? what do i type?[508]
channel.description: hi can someone please help me i need to know how to make other people mod on my 508 server! i ttried ::givemod / ::makemod i've tried lots of stuff please help me. thank you.

item.title: [508]how do i make people mod? what do i type?[508]
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

I D D S I, that’s not how you do it, go into login.java, search the original owners name, or staff members name, and change it to yours/staff members, easy as that.

Read full topic

item.title: [508]how do i make people mod? what do i type?[508]
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

bombtwinz:

hi can someone please help me i need to know how to make other people mod on my 508 server! i ttried ::givemod / ::makemod i’ve tried lots of stuff please help me. thank you.

download notepad++
go to characters, click edit with notepad++, and change ur rights to 2. (or 1)
